text:
When Vice President Mike Pence walked into the Mayo Clinic, he wasn't wearing a face mask.

Everyone else in the building was, according to reporters traveling with him. That has been the policy at the Rochester, Minnesota, facility since April 13. https://t.co/VBp1abObl9

urls.title: Pence flouts Mayo Clinic policy on masks -- which is to wear one
urls.description: When Vice President Mike Pence walked into the Mayo Clinic on Tuesday, he wasn't wearing a face mask.
